Star Trek: Picard

(a Titles & Air Dates Guide)

Last updated: Wed, 26 Apr 2023 -1:00
A retired Star Fleet admiral is drawn back into service after his attempt to help the daughter of an old friend uncovers a vast conspiracy.
Show Details:
Start date: Jan 2020
End date: Apr 2023
Status: cancelled/ended
Network(s): Paramount+ (US)
Run time: 60 min
Episodes: 30 eps
Genre(s): Drama, Science Fiction
Credits:
  • Patrick Stewart as Admiral Jean-Luc Picard
  • Jeri Ryan as Seven
  • Michelle Hurd as Raffi Musiker
  • Orla Brady as Laris / Tallinn
  • Evan Evagora as Elnor [ 1-2 ]
  • Alison Pill as Dr. Agnes Jurati [ 1-2 ]
  • Isa Briones as Soji Asher / Kore Soong [ 1-2 ]
  • Santiago Cabrera as Captain Cris Rios / EMH [ 1-2 ]
  • Brent Spiner as Data / Dr. Altan Inigo Soong
  • Harry Treadaway as Narek [ 1 ]
  • Jonathan Frakes as Will Riker [ 3 ]
  • Gates McFadden as Dr. Beverly Crusher [ 3 ]
  • Ed Speleers as Jack Crusher [ 3 ]
    • recurring:
  • Peyton List as Lt. Narissa Rizzo [ 1 ]
  • Tamlyn Tomita as Commodore Oh [ 1 ]
  • John de Lancie as Q [ 2 ]
  • Annie Wersching as Borg Queen [ 2 ]
  • Todd Stashwick as Captain Liam Shaw [ 3 ]
  • Ashlei Sharpe Chestnut as Ensign Sidney La Forge [ 3 ]
